channel.title: My school
channel.description:
Alright huge news everyone just got. In sailorway middle school, they are moving all the 8th graders next year into the high school. Along with the whole high scool is getting laptops to use! This is sick.
What to dissic? What kind of neat things happens at your school?

item.title: My school
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“demonlover14, post:43, topic:340066”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=436444.msg3209855#msg3209855 date=1274137774]
Lol there’s only girl fights at our school. All the good fights end fast since the police guard comes out. >.>

No one messes with the police guard.
[/quote]
Police guard?
Lol I’ve never heard of a cop or any sort being at a school for that.
Your school must be really bad.[/quote]Our school has like 10 police guards protecting it for each building.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Natey Natey
item.description:
@Natey wrote:

The only thing that happened once was my good friend Harley and this black dude were about to fight and the black dude started swinging like a girl, scratched my friends face, then my friend just went off on the dude, KOed him, then the principal came out and got his ass whooped too

item.title: My school
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:36, topic:340066”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=436444.msg3208757#msg3208757 date=1274039449]

Nothing interesting happens in our school. It’s always been the same for 7 and 8th graders - 8th graders come to the highschool for 1 hour of the day to take a class. This doesn’t count towards credits or anything, it’s just to get a taste of the highschool.

Unfortunately our school is full of cocky people, and the only sport we do great in is basketball/some football.

Our schools have GREAT teams.
We went undeafed in wrestleing, and had a few games of 0-17.
We have really good basket ball players.
And the football players are like a 80% win streak.
We have this one kid named Ben, hes amazing at track
[/quote]
All of our shit happens at break and lunch time.

  • Fights
  • Food-Fights
  • Plastic-Knife wars ect.
    its kewl ;D[/quote]
    Lol at the, “Plastic-Knife wars”

Read full topic

item.description:

[quote=“Javafire, post:7, topic:340066”][quote author=Liquid Magic link=topic=436444.msg3206358#msg3206358 date=1273864178]

Alright huge news everyone just got.
In sailorway middle school, they are moving all the 8th graders next year into the high school.
Along with the whole high scool is getting laptops to use!
This is sick.

What to dissic?
What kind of neat things happens at your school?

nothing… IM HOMESCHOOLED DAMMIT (well if you can call it that, i go to like 5 different one/twice a week classes from around morning to 8pm at night sometimes :P)

I’m home schooled too, boring as fuck.
[/quote]
eh not rlly, it’s alot easier to get stuff done on your own time without nazi teachers telling you what to do. i’ve been homeschooled since the 6th grade im in the 10th now[/quote]

I went to school since I was 5, and now I am 14 in same school, same friends…

item.title: My school
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:11, topic:340066”]My highschool has won five statechampionships this year. We probably will win track states and Lax we might[/quote]We had the best wrestler in the country (Andrew Howe). I say had because he graduated 2 years ago. I was in wrestling with him, it was fucking amazing.

[quote=“http://www.examiner.com/x-7334-College-Wrestling-Examiner~y2010m3d22-Wisconsins-Andrew-Howe-wins-165-title-at-2010-NCAA-Div-I-Wrestling-Championships”]2010 NCAA All-Americans – 165 pounds:
1st: Andrew Howe (Wisconsin)
2d: Dan Vallimont (Penn State)
3d: Jarrod King (Edinboro)
4th: Nick Amuchastegui (Stanford)
5th: Tyler Caldwell (Oklahoma)
6th: Andrew Rendos (Bucknell)
7th: Ryan Morningstar (Iowa)
8th: Chris Brown (Old Dominion)[/quote]

Read full topic
